original_title: Bryn Fon: Chwilio am Feibion Glyndwr
overview: During the 1980s the cottage arson campaign claimed the headlines and confused Welsh police forces for years. But who were the Sons of Glyndŵr, the group who claimed to be responsible? And why was Bryn Fôn wrongly charged and remanded in custody? The singer and actor is determined to find out the truth.
title: Bryn Fon: Search for the Sons of Glyndwr
